name: deathlock
description:
you can’t cross the screen borders unless you’re dead.

but if you’re dead, you can’t control your body.

no biggie, though.  you just gotta figure out how to DIE, WITH MOMENTUM.

standard platformer controls + r to respawn.  accidentally kept a debug slowdown button in the game - don't press f!

made in 72 hours for ludum dare 45 - start with nothing.  (every screen is started with no health.)

music by saiziju.  everything else by winterbeak.

coded from scratch using python and pygame.  source code can be found here.
